member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeployAliases
member.summary:
Contains functionality for working with the MsDeploy.exe (Web Deploy) command line interface (cli).
MsDeploy v3.6 will already have to be installed on the machine the Cake Script is being executed on.
See also https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=43717

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeployAliases.MsDeploy(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings)
member.summary: Executes an MsDeploy operation for the given source, destination (optional), and operation settings.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipAction
member.summary: Including this setting causes the skip to be handled as a skip rule, thus avoiding the actions from being performed on the objects identified by the other settings.

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipAction.Update
member.summary: update Skip Action

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipAction.Delete
member.summary: Delete Skip Action

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipAction.AddChild
member.summary: Add Child Skip Action

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective
member.summary: Directive used to exclude objects from a sync operation, or it lets you use a skip rule to exclude actions from an operation.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.SkipAction
member.summary: Which action to skip

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.ObjectName
member.summary: Regular expression that will be used to match the object name

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.AbsolutePath
member.summary: Regular expression that will be used to match the absolute path of the object

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.XPath
member.summary: XPath expression that identifies the object.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.KeyAttribute
member.summary: Regular expression that will be used to match the value of the key attribute of the object.

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.ToCommandLineArgument
member.summary: Converts the SkipDirective into its commmand line argument

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.Directives.SkipDirective.AppendCommandLineArgument(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Converts the object into its MSDeploy command line equivalent and Appends it to the stringbuilder
member.param: StringBuilder to apply command line to.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.IMsDeployArgument
member.summary: Marks the object as able to be converted into an MSDeploy command line argument

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.IMsDeployArgument.ToCommandLineArgument
member.summary: Converts the object into its MSDeploy command line equivalent

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.IMsDeployArgument.AppendCommandLineArgument(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Converts the object into its MSDeploy command line equivalent and Appends it to the stringbuilder
member.param: StringBuilder to apply command line to.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.Verb
member.summary: Action to perform (required).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.Source
member.summary: The source object for the operation (required).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.Destination
member.summary: The destination object for the operation.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DeclareParams
member.summary: Collection of Parameters to DECLARE during a sync operation

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.SetParams
member.summary: Collection of Parameters to SET during a sync operation

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DeclareParamFile
member.summary: Includes parameter declarations from an XML file.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.SetParamFile
member.summary: Applies parameter settings from an XML file

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.RemoveParams
member.summary: Collection parameters to remove from the declare list

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.EnableLinks
member.summary: Enables the specified link extension(s).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DisableLinks
member.summary: Collection of link extensions to disable during a sync operation

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.EnableRules
member.summary: Enables the specified synchronization rule(s).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DisableRules
member.summary: Disables the specified synchronization rule(s).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.ReplacementRules
member.summary: Specifies collection of attribute replacement rules

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.RetryAttempts
member.summary: The number of times a provider will retry after a failed action (not all providers support retrying). Defaults to 5.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.RetryInterval
member.summary: Interval in milliseconds between retry attempts (-retryAttempts). The default is 1000.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.SkipDirectives
member.summary: Collection of SkipDirectives that specifies object(s) to skip during synchronization.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.EnableSkipDirective
member.summary: Specifies collection of specified skip directive(s) to enable.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DisableSkipDirective
member.summary: Specifies collection of specified skip directive(s) to disable.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.Verbose
member.summary: Enables more verbose output.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.WhatIf
member.summary: Displays what would have happened without actually performing any operations.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.DisableAppStore
member.summary: Disables saving to the application store during a sync

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.XPath
member.summary: An XPath expression to apply to XML output.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.Xml
member.summary: True to Return results in XML format.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.AllowUntrusted
member.summary: Allow untrusted server certificate when using SSL.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.UseCheckSum
member.summary: This setting is useful when you want to copy only the files whose content has changed, and ignore files that have the same content but different time stamps.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.ShowSecure
member.summary: true to show secure attributes in XML output instead of hiding them

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.PreSyncCommand
member.summary: Command to run on the remote server before a sync operation starts

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.MsDeploySettings.PostSyncCommand
member.summary: Command to run on the remote server after a sync operation completes

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contains MSDeploy aliases for the MSDeploy command line utility.

member.summary: Uses Windows Authentication scheme

member.summary: Uses the basic authentication

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider
member.summary: contract for an MsDeployProvider

member.summary: Name of the MSDeploy Provider

member.summary: Determines if the Provider is a source or destination

member.summary: Path of the provider type

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.ComputerName
member.summary: Name of remote computer or proxy-URL

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.WebManagementService
member.summary: Name of remote computer or proxy-URL for the Web Management Service (WMSvc). Assumes that the service is listening on port 8172.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Authentication scheme to use. NTLM is the default setting. If the wmsvc option is specified, then Basic is the default setting.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.Username
member.summary: User name to authenticate for remote connections (required if using Basic authentication).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.Password
member.summary: Password of the user for remote connections (required if using Basic authentication).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.IncludeAcls
member.summary: If true, include ACLs in the operation (applies to the file system, registry, and metabase).

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.TempAgent
member.summary: Temporarily install the remote agent for the duration of a remote operation.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.IMsDeployProvider.PublishSettings
member.summary: File path to a publish settings file which contains remote connection information

member.summary: Specify the name of the template file in the site root to use to take the application offline during the sync.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppHostConfigProvider.WebConfigEncryptProvider
member.summary: Specify the name of a .NET Framework protected configuration provider available on destination to be used for encryption of destination web.config file.Default provider used is RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppHostSchemaProvider
member.summary: IIS 7 configuration schema

member.summary: Enable 32-bit application pool on IIS7.

member.summary: true or false value for the 'Enable32Bit' setting.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppPoolNetFxProvider
member.summary: The appPoolNetFx provider displays or sets the .NET Framework version of an IIS application pool.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppPoolNetFxProvider.NetFxVersion
member.summary: Used to specify which .NET framework version to use with given provider.

member.summary: The appPoolPipeline provider displays or sets the managed pipeline mode of the specified IIS application pool.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppPoolPipelineProvider.PipelineMode
member.summary: Set managedPipelineMode to Classic or Integrated in order to validate if the destination application pool matches.The value will not be set, it will only be compared.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.AppPoolPipelineMode
member.summary: Set managedPipelineMode to Classic or Integrated in order to validate if the destination application pool matches.The value will not be set, it will only be compared.

member.summary: Archive directory

member.summary: Used to specify a database connection string.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.BackupManagerProvider.UseLatest
member.summary: Set useLatest to true to restore the latest available backup

member.summary: Manages your site's backup settings

member.summary: A boolean value used to specify whether backups will occur during a sync.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.BackupSettingsProvider.NumberOfBackups
member.summary: Positive integer used to specify the maximum number of backups you would like to store on the server

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.BackupSettingsProvider.ContinueSyncOnBackupFailure

member.summary: List of providers to add to the existing excluded provider list for a backup.

member.summary: Certificate

member.summary: Specify the name of a .NET Framework protected configuration provider available on destination to be used for encryption of destination web.config file.Default provider used is RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.ContentPathProvider.SyncPackageTimeStamps
member.summary: The ContentPathLib provider does not compare timestamps of files that live under the approot\packages folder.To force Web Deploy to compare timestamps, set this setting to 'true'.

member.summary: Used to deploy ASP.Net libraries that live in the 'approot' folder, which is a sibling to the content root folder.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.ContentPathLibProvider.SyncPackageTimeStamps
member.summary: The ContentPathLib provider does not compare timestamps of files that live under the approot\packages folder.To force Web Deploy to compare timestamps, set this setting to 'true'.

member.summary: Set managedPipelineMode to Classic or Integrated in order to validate if the destination application pool matches.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.RecycleAppProvider
member.summary: Recycles, starts, or stops an application's app pool, or unloads an application's app domains on IIS 7.
member.code: msdeploy.exe -verb:sync -source:recycleApp -dest:recycleApp="Default Web Site/myapp",recycleMode="StopAppPool" msdeploy.exe -verb:sync -source:recycleApp="Default Web Site/myapp" -dest:auto

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.RecycleAppProvider.RecycleMode
member.summary: One of 4 values to control what action is taken on the application pool: RecycleAppPool, StartAppPool, StopAppPool, or UnloadAppDomain. The default is RecycleAppPool.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.RecycleAppProvider.Timeout
member.summary: Amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for an application pool to recycle, start or stop. To return immediately after requesting the operation (without waiting for completion), specify zero. To use the application pool's startupTimeLimit and shutdownTimeLimit (or the sum of their values in the case of a recycle), specify -1. The default value is -1.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Providers.MsDeployProviders.RecycleMode
member.summary: Action to take when using the the "recycleApp" provider

member.summary: The file system rights to be granted to the user (for example, FullControl, or ReadAndExecute, or Read). If empty, Read is used.

member.summary: The file system entity being referenced (Directory or File). If empty, Directory is used.

member.summary: he file system entity being referenced

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Operation
member.summary: MsDeploy operations

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Operation.Sync
member.summary: Synchronizes data between a source and a destination.

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Operation.Dump
member.summary: Returns information about a source object

member.name: F:Cake.MsDeploy.Operation.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the object(s) specified by the destination argument.

member.name: T:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule
member.summary: Items to replace during a synchronization operation.

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.ObjectName
member.summary: Returns the deployment objects that have names that match the regular expression

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.ScopeAttributeName
member.summary: Returns only the objects that have one or more attribute names that match the regular expression

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.ScopeAttributeValue
member.summary: Returns only objects that have an attribute with a value that matches the regular expression

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.TargetAttributeName
member.summary: The attribute name or names where the replace rule will apply. I

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.Match
member.summary: Optional text to find that matches the regular expression

member.name: P:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.Value
member.summary: Replaces the values specified with this value

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.ToCommandLineArgument
member.summary: Converts the SetParameter into its commmand line argument

member.name: M:Cake.MsDeploy.Rules.ReplacementRule.AppendCommandLineArgument(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Converts the object into its MSDeploy command line equivalent and Appends it to the stringbuilder
member.param: StringBuilder to apply command line to.
